LanguageData.ARA_InsectCreep.label: arachne creep
LanguageData.ARA_InsectCreep.description: A ground made of a mixture of fungi and crustacean secretions laid down by the Arachnid, which automatically spreads around various Arachnid structures.This strange structure is densely textured and contains many nutrient-transporting tissues, allowing it to support large buildings, grow crops, and accelerate the speed of the Arachnids as they move above it, although non-Insects are unlikely to want to walk on this soft biological structure.
LanguageData.ARA_InsectCreepFloor.label: Arachne Enhanced Creep
LanguageData.ARA_InsectCreepFloor.description: A ground made of a mixture of fungi and crustacean secretions laid down by the Arachne Bugs.Its properties are similar to Arachne Creep, but it can also spread on support structures and can be used as a base for the Bug Ships' Gravships.
LanguageData.ARA_InsectCreepTile.label: arachne creep tile
LanguageData.ARA_InsectCreepTile.description: A bed of creep made by the Arachne insects with a mixture of steel and crustacean material, which is more tidy than ordinary creep, easier to clean, and does not leak mucus. Fertility is lost, but other characteristics of the insect creep are inherited.
